WorkItem.Description:
I noticed that when publishing new stories, the "Published Dates" of the already published resources get reset as well.
Once published, the published date should not be recalculated.
WorkItem.Summary: Published Dates Recalculate on ALL Entries, instead of just NEW entries.

Comments.Message:
Hi Guys, 

I think I need to clarify a bit. Think of it as Billboard Top 20 kind of style where a story can have multiple rank at different time and as long as it is popular it will stay in the chart.

Does that mean it is not an issue Rashid and it is as designed?
If it is by design I guess a developer can build another class where he/she can provide another implementation of this and configure to use his/her own implementation. Correct me if I am wrong
